```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dslabs)
library(tidyverse)
# This is the URL for the data that will be analyzed.
urlfile <- "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/AER/Guns.csv"
# Read the data into R and name it cricketers.
Gun <- read_csv(url(urlfile))
```

## R Markdown

```{r cars}
Gun =subset(Gun, select = -c(X1, state, law))
round(cor(Gun),1)
```
